title: A letter vvritten by a learned and reverent divine, to William Laud, now L. Bishop of Canterbury: concerning his inclination to popery, perswading him not to halt betweene two opinions, but to be stedfast to the Protestant religion.
author: Learned and reverend divine.
publicationDate: Printed in the year of Gods great and merciful deliverance from sundry Romish and Jesuiticall plots against this state and kingdome 1643
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
